com.jde.model.entity.player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jde.model.entity.player.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    This Player class contains the animations, attacks and stats of the playable character
    Author:
    HarZe (David Serrano)

      Animation focusAnimation,

        Parameters:
        animation - Main player animation
        focusAnimation - Focused player overlay animation
        spawnPoint - Respawn point of the player
        baseAttack - Player's wave attack

      • update

        public java.util.ArrayList<Bullet> update(double ms,
                                 double timeStamp)
        This method updates the player state, spawn new bullets (if any) and moves the player if needed
        Parameters:
        ms - Milliseconds to forward
        timeStamp - Current time stamp
        Returns:
        PLayer's bullets to spawn
